document.full_text: despite being known as a consummate winner with five world series rings to back that up, new york yankees captain and shortstop derek jeter has as much to prove as any player heading into the 2011 major league baseball season.
document.title: jeter under microscope in 16th season for yankees
lines_and_colors: despite being known as a consummate winner with five world series rings to back that up, new york yankees captain and shortstop derek jeter has as much to prove as any player heading into the 2011 major league baseball season.
